videos_section.title: Smart Tools for Advanced Management
videos_section.subtitle: Analysis tools, personalized suggestions, and multilingual support – so you can manage, understand, and respond better, anytime.

analytics_card.title: Real-Time Analytics
analytics_card.description: Real-time analytics allow you to track your application's performance, understand user behavior, and improve the user experience.

smart_suggestions.title: Smart Suggestions
smart_suggestions.description: Smart suggestions provide advanced analytics to improve efficiency, identify recurring issues, and compare employees – helping to prevent damage to property and improve team management.

language_support.title: Support in All Languages
language_support.description: Language support allows you to offer your app in different languages and adapt the user experience to each user's preferred language.

mini_section.title: Real-Time Management from Your Computer or Mobile
mini_section.subtitle: From one system, you control alerts, teams, and events – without missing anything important.

app_notifications.title: Real-Time Notifications
app_notifications.description: Notifications are sent to the team the moment a new request is received, its status changes, or a chat message arrives – so employees can respond quickly, stay organized, and ensure efficient handling in any situation.

advanced_admin.title: A Smart Management System that Centralizes Everything in One Place
advanced_admin.description: Our dashboard gives you full control over all issues, tasks, and settings – in real time and in one intuitive interface. This way, you can manage your teams smartly, respond faster, and significantly improve the guest service experience.

feature_section.monitor_description: A smart management system that allows you to manage employees, track requests, open new requests, and analyze performance in real time – all from a single convenient interface that streamlines processes and improves daily operations.
feature_section.employee_app_description: A user-friendly mobile app that enables task assignment, problem resolution, team communication, and real-time updates – making fieldwork faster, more organized, and more efficient.
feature_section.guest_app_description: An advanced chatbot available 24/7 that provides instant responses to general questions, opens requests, supports multiple languages, and uses smart routing – all while connecting to the hotel's database for up-to-date information.

first_showcase.title: The App That Organizes Hotel Requests
first_showcase.main_description: Our app allows the hotel staff to track all requests in real time, assign tasks, communicate through an internal chat,
first_showcase.highlighted: and ensure that every request is resolved quickly and efficiently.
first_showcase.continued_description: Everything is centralized in one place, so employees can focus on what really matters.

second_showcase.title: The Smart Chatbot for Hotel Guest Service
second_showcase.main_description: Guests can ask the chatbot any question about hotel facilities, operating hours, and available services –
second_showcase.highlighted: and receive an immediate and accurate response 24/7
second_showcase.continued_description: If needed, the chatbot can also open a request directly to the staff, so the issue is handled quickly and without effort from the guest or reception.

accessibilityStatement.title: Accessibility Declaration
accessibilityStatement.commitmentText: Staysync is obliged to ensure digital access to people with disabilities.
accessibilityStatement.conformanceText: Our platform strives to meet WCAG 2.1 levels AA.
accessibilityStatement.featuresIntro: Our site includes the following accessibility features:
accessibilityStatement.featureTextSize: Adjustable text size for better calls
accessibilityStatement.featureContrast: High contrast mode to see better
accessibilityStatement.featureCursor: A large marker option for a lighter navigation
accessibilityStatement.compatibilityText: Our site is designed to be compatible with screen readers and the following aid technologies:
accessibilityStatement.contactText: If you have encountered accessibility barriers or you have improved proposals, please contact our accessibility team:
accessibilityStatement.updatesText: We are obliged to regularly check and update our accessibility features to ensure the best experience for all users.

hero_title_part2: in a controlled and simple way
hero_description: One system that centralizes everything the hotel needs. From managing teams to handling issues and communicating with guests - everything works together in one smart platform. With built-in artificial intelligence, you get insights, automation, and improvement in performance and service.
customer_message: Hello! I have a problem with my room key. Can you help?
ai_response: I opened a ticket and someone will come to help you right now!
management_dashboard_desc: Full control over hotel operations, team management and real-time data analysis
employee_app_desc: Efficient mobile experience for task management and quick issue resolution for staff
smart_guest_assistant_desc: Advanced chatbot that provides 24/7 guest support and helps with general questions and easy ticket creation
built_for_all_users: Built for all users in your hotel - from management, through staff to guests
smart_automation_desc: Smart task routing and priority allocation by context
strategic_insights_desc: Data-driven recommendations for improving operations and call resolution times
fast_actions_desc: Capable of creating and updating calls, departments, and more
real_time_reporting_desc: Real-time data dashboards with insights and action metrics
personal_assistant_desc: Learns your hotel and answers questions automatically
proactive_monitoring_desc: Early warning systems for risks and compliance issues
ai_engine_description: Our AI engine constantly learns from your activity to provide smarter insights, faster responses and more efficient workflows
contact_team_description: Contact our team to join us and get custom changes just for your hotel.
reports_subtitle: Comprehensive insights and data analysis for your hotel operations
no_urgent_issues: No urgent issues - everything is running smoothly!
no_peak_hours_data: No peak hours data for today

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introText: At Bloom (StaySync), we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our mobile application (the 'App'). Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site or the application.
privacyPolicy.collectionText: We may collect information about you in a variety of ways. The information we may collect on the Site and the App includes:
privacyPolicy.personalDataText: Personally identifiable information, such as your name, shipping address, email address, and telephone number, and demographic information, such as your age, gender, hometown, and interests, that you voluntarily give to us when you register with the Site or App or when you choose to participate in various activities related to the Site and App.
privacyPolicy.derivativeDataText: Information our servers automatically collect when you access the Site or App, such as your IP address, your browser type, your operating system, your access times, and the pages you have viewed directly before and after accessing the Site or App.
privacyPolicy.useText: Having accurate information about you permits us to provide you with a smooth, efficient, and customized experience. Specifically, we may use information collected about you via the Site or App to:

useList.2: Compile anonymous statistical data and analysis for use internally or with third parties.
useList.3: Email you regarding your account or order.
useList.5: Fulfill and manage purchases, orders, payments, and other transactions related to the Site and App.
useList.6: Generate a personal profile about you to make future visits to the Site and App more personalized.
useList.7: Increase the efficiency and operation of the Site and App.
useList.8: Monitor and analyze usage and trends to improve your experience with the Site and App.
useList.9: Notify you of updates to the Site and App.
useList.10: Offer new products, services, and/or recommendations to you.

privacyPolicy.disclosureText: We may share information we have collected about you in certain situations. Your information may be disclosed as follows:
privacyPolicy.law: By Law or to Protect Rights
privacyPolicy.lawText: If we believe the release of information about you is necessary to respond to legal process, to investigate or remedy potential violations of our policies, or to protect the rights, property, and safety of others, we may share your information as permitted or required by any applicable law, rule, or regulation.
privacyPolicy.securityText: We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to help protect your personal information. While we have taken reasonable steps to secure the personal information you provide to us, please be aware that despite our efforts, no security measures are perfect or impenetrable, and no method of data transmission can be guaranteed against any interception or other type of misuse.
privacyPolicy.childrenText: We do not knowingly solicit information from or market to children under the age of 13. If you become aware of any data we have collected from children under age 13, please contact us using the contact information provided below.
privacyPolicy.contactText: If you have questions or comments about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
